file_content.text: Ambient air temperature is over three hundred degrees. No wonder there are no organics here.
Take care of your servos. You don't want them melting.
Goodness! I hadn't thought of that.
You mean other than the creatures trying to rip us apart?
Oh, them. Right.
I searched my datafiles two million times, but I still can't find any record explaining my function.
I'm sure it will come to you. You're doing fine.
You really think so? Hee!
Perhaps you're cannon fodder.
Then I don't have nearly enough cannons.
My sensors indicate the left path leads to a dead end. We should go right.
What will we find there?
Things to shoot.
Good to know.
I like your armor, HK. So shiny!
Thank you for noticing.
The lava glow really sets it off.
I like to be better-looking than my enemies.
Which part of "don't talk" did you not understand?
Is this better?
No, it is not!
An underground volcano base and an underwater biome! The Shroud spared no expense.
He could've at least built a waterproof walkway. I don't want to rust down here.
I like this place. It's peaceful. Wait!
Hmm. Thought I detected a giant firaxan shark. Never mind.
Are you playing with me?
Maybe a little.
I'm picking up multiple organic readings inside. I wonder if they can breathe underwater.
Interesting question.
It couldn't hurt to flood the base.
On the contrary, it would hurt them a great deal.
Foolish guards. Too stupid to run!
I guess we have to defeat all these guards, don't we?
Stand down, loyal minions! This was only a test. You've all passed. Take the rest of the day off.
That's right, everyone clear out. Go relax--you, especially. I can tell you're stressed out.
Well done, Zeeyo.
These lumps need special suits just to breathe out here. Can you imagine?
Or too frightened of what will happen if they do.
They die either way.
Hee! They bought it!
Try to show a bit more enthusiasm.
Um... oh, boy, here I go killing!
Marginally better.
Being a meatbag is terribly inconvenient.
Wow, this view sure is pretty!
Are you referring to the stars or the aftermath of our carnage?
Oh... both, I suppose.
We are droids of destruction. We do not use the word "pretty."
Oh... wow, this view sure is terrifying.
Pew, pew, pew!
You don't need blaster sound effects. That's what the blaster is for.
Oh, come on. Don't tell me you've never done it!
Only when I'm certain no one can hear me.
Trust me, they heard you.
Ooh, let's play a game! How about "I Spy"?
Refusal: I am not playing a game, Zeeyo.
Come on! It'll be fun!
Resignation: Fine.
I spy, with my little photoreceptor... something to shoot!
I spy, with my photoreceptor... something shiny!
It's me, isn't it?
Wow! How did you know?
Okay, one more! I spy, with my photoreceptor... something metal!
It's you.
You're cheating!
Declaration: This game is over.
What will you do to the Shroud when you catch him?
Dismemberment, interrogation, termination...
Or... you could send him on a really long timeout!
That punishment is insufficient.
A timeout... with no arms?
Concession: Acceptable.
Wow, the Shroud wasn't kidding! As secret lairs go, this is impressive!
Have you seen any other secret lairs?
Nooo, but I can't imagine they'd be better than this one!
